creditline: The Katherine Kittridge McMillan Memorial Fund, the Suzanne S. Roberts Endowment for Asian Art, and the Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
medium: Opaque watercolor heightened with gold on paper
text: Two figures closely embrace beneath a tree during a lightning storm. The taller figure has blue skin and is wearing an ornate crown; he has his arms around the other figure, who holds a pink lotus flower. There are two other people facing the embracing couple, one holding another lotus and the other holding an umbrella over the couple.
title: Krishna and Radha Sheltering from the Rain
